verbose_text: We attribute the panobinostat mediated G 2 delay and downstream mitotic defects to aberrant Plk1 and Cyclin B1 expression since reduction of Plk1 expression by RNA interference produces similar mitotic and cytokinesis defects, and Cyclin B1 knockdown causes a G 2 delay and slower mitotic transition with similar abnormalities to those observed in this study XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR.
